selection_reasoning: The evolution has converged on a very high-quality topology (score ~2.635983). Generation 6 matched and slightly improved the precision of the best solution. The selection focuses on the top-performing hybrid methods (6_5, 6_1) and the core refinement engines (5_4, 6_3) to push toward the best known theoretical limit in the final generations.

trial_selections.reasoning: Current best overall score (2.6359830855). Uses a hybrid Basin-Hopping and LP-SLSQP approach.
Previous best and very close to the current best. Its force-directed approach found the winning topology.
Strong hybrid approach (2.6359830849) that combines force-directed search with iterative LP refinement.
A solid implementation of the iterative LP-SLSQP method (2.634), which is excellent for high-precision local refinement.
